title: Yuumi Club
body: Alright, who do I have to purr to, to get an Invite to the Yuumi Club???

replies.body: Add Crowd Control for an invite

> [{quoted}](name=Charlesztq,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=P8JOQrF3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T05:18:43.821+0000)
>
> i added you

You have access to invite in Yuumi club? I wanna get invited too!
